#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio>

using namespace std;

#define LL long long int
#define MAXN 11111

bool possible(int k, int n, LL candies[]) {
    LL fromLastBox = 0;
    for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
        LL cur = candies[i] + fromLastBox;
        if (cur < k) return false;
        fromLastBox = cur - k;
    }
    return true;
}

void solve(int testNumber) {
    int n;
    LL candies[MAXN];
    scanf("%d", &n);
    for (int i = 0; i < n; ++i) {
        scanf("%lld", &candies[i]);
    }

    int lo = 0, hi = (int) 1e9;
    while (lo <= hi) {
        int mid = lo + (hi - lo) / 2;
        possible(mid, n, candies) ? lo = mid + 1 : hi = mid - 1;
    }

    printf("%d\n", hi);
}

int main() {
    int testCount;
    scanf("%d", &testCount);
    for (int testNumber = 1; testNumber <= testCount; ++testNumber) {
        solve(testNumber);
    }
    return 0;
}
